diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +89,93 @@
Performance improvements for ``packbits`` and ``unpackbits``
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The functions ``numpy.packbits`` with boolean input and ``numpy.unpackbits`` have
been optimized to be a significantly faster for contiguous data.
